text: The raccoon butterflyfish (Chaetodon lunula), is a species of marine ray- finned fish.It is a butterflyfish belonging to the family Chaetodontidae. It is found in the Indian and Pacific Oceans. ==Other names== This fish is also known as the crescent-masked butterflyfish, lunule butterflyfish, halfmoon butterflyfish, moon butterflyfish, raccoon butterfly, raccoon, raccoon coralfish, and redstriped butterflyfish. ==References and notes== Category:Perciformes
title: Raccoon butterflyfish
